description: Swiss chocolate-maker Milka challenged the German bar's right to be the only square bar in Germany.
title: Germany's Ritter Sport wins square chocolate battle against Milka
title_page: Germany's Ritter Sport wins square chocolate battle against Milka - BBC News
maintext: The square bar dates back to 1932, when Clara Ritter came up with the idea, according to company legend. "Let's make a chocolate bar that fits in everyone's jacket pocket without breaking and weighs the same as a normal long bar," she is supposed to have said (although in German).
